amendment.description: Amendment, as modified, creates a "Team B"--a counterterrorism competitive analysis council of outside experts--to continuously advise the Director of National Intelligence and the Congress on how best to revise plans, operations, concepts, organizations, and capabilities across the intelligence community in response to the evolving threat of terrorism and domestic radicalization.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Wolf amendment (A002) modified by unanimous consent.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Wolf.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wolf amendment (A002) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
